programme.title: Nature Cat S2

To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: LEGO Friends - Girls On A Mission S3
programme.desc: The girls are pursuing their individual passions and putting in the hard work and commitment it takes to achieve their dreams. And our girls are not afraid to do whatever it takes!

programme.title: LEGO Monkie Kid S2 - Revenge Of The Spider Queen
programme.desc: MK accidentally shrinks himself and falls down the drain, into the sewers, and finds himself back in the lair of the Spider Queen.

programme.title: Mind Blown!
programme.desc: Singapore used to be part of the British empire. The British still have a royal family. So why don't we have British kings and queens anymore? Were they ever in charge here? Mindblown heads back to 1819 and Raffles' landing to find out what happened next.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, bad-ass stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Helmi falls seriously ill before Rosnani can tell Adina about her decision whether to take over the restaurant. Katelyn finds it hard to keep her relationship with Nathan a secret.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - At The Vets
programme.desc: It's a different kind of day for our vets! From vaccinating horses and researching cancer treatments to mentoring junior vets, it is all in a day's work for our animal doctors.

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S21

programme.desc: Helmi falls seriously ill before Rosnani can tell Adina about her decision whether to take over the restaurant. Katelyn finds it hard to keep her relationship with Nathan a secret.

America's brightest are put to the test, but will they be able to keep their wits about them when their body is stressed? Who will have what it takes to be a Mental Samurai?

Tim runs away with the only pumpkin left, which is needed to make the cure for Billy. Paula and the rest have to race against the clock to find Tim and pumpkin, or Billy will be stuck as a werewolf forever!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: The Imp has had enough, this time he's done his homework and plotted his best ever plan yet! He succeeds in stealing Sloppy's power tool belt! But now that he's got it, he doesn't know what to do with it. While the team tries to get their tool back, the Imp is almost kidnapped by a dastardly bounty hunter. Poly-GON!

programme.title: The Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde
programme.desc: Join the Enchantimals on their exciting adventures, where they head to Frozenwood in search of an ice cream that never melts and visit Grazy Grasslands, to help Merrit Monkey and Cherish Cheetah Enchantimals find the cure for hiccupitis!

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: The Fairy Godmother gives the students a special assignment: creating an original outfit with shoes. The heroes leave to search for the sparkling Stardust, as they want to decorate their dress with it. During a ball at Cinderella Castle, the villains free the Eating Time Bunny, which stops the clock at midnight, thus making Rose and her family lose all their powers...

programme.title: Moominvalley S1 & S2
programme.desc: Winter arrives to Moominvalley and its inhabitants are puzzled by the continued absence of the Moomin family. They try their best to welcome a new guest, Toffle, whose imagination starts to play tricks on everyone.

Together they will try to stay afloat and achieve the impossible within 48 hours, with a budget of S$1.500 plus the help of two carefully chosen lifelines.

programme.title: Kong - King Of The Apes
programme.desc: In the season climax, Kong battles Mega-Richard, a gigantically transformed version of Lukas' criminal brother. Meanwhile, Lukas and Jonesy contend against Richard's army of patchwork Bionobots, while Danny and Panchi attempt (unsuccessfully) to stay out of harm's way. The clones exercise free will, making choices that help turn the tables and aid our heroes in defeating Richard and Botila once and for all.

programme.title: Open Homes S2

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Oysters and oyster goodies can be easily found all over Taiwan. Many Taiwanese are even willing to drive long distances to savour oysters at their best. programme.desc: Reza finds himself wrapped around the finger of a glamorous doctor who is in the news for all the wrong reasons. At the same time, Marcus is embroiled in a case of malpractice with his business partners, finding himself in an ethical quandary. The game is up for Chae Lian when Winston confronts Chae Lian about her deceit and throws the household into chaos, compounding the stress that threatens to finally crack her.

programme.title: Lion Mums S3
programme.desc: Chae Lian's exhaustion reaches tipping point, and her three children must band together to support her. Will the misunderstanding between mother and son be finally dissolved? Marcus attempts to right the wrongs of his company, going against his business partners to ensure justice. Marcus' decision to right the wrongs and fight for justice leaves him with a lot to lose, but will he hold on to the virtue of having done the right thing?

The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.desc: (重) 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣.

programme.title: 96oC咖啡
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 对立乔一直默默暗恋的唐雨晨，仍然不离不弃的守在立乔身边，她不忍心看着自己欣赏的立乔一阙不振，决心帮助立乔走出伤痛，重拾信心和欢笑。传之是96度C的常客，在雨晨眼里，他是个不事生产，沉迷上网的现代草莓一族，拥有严重的"王子病"，喝咖啡却没钱买单。为了还债，他只好接受雨晨的安排，留在96度Café 打工。传之来自富裕问题家庭，因为母亲意外卧病，父亲刘浩仁不甘寂寞与公司职员Ann发展了一段婚外畸恋, 传之为此与浩仁父子冲突离家出走。在96度C, 传之与雨晨相处的过程，发现自己爱上雨晨。他深知立乔封闭的心开始接受雨晨的感情，决定默默隐藏起感情，成全守候着雨晨。.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、被驱逐、被打击，但她都一一挺过来，最后重振已衰败的家族生意.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、被驱逐、被打击，但她都一一挺过来，最后重振已衰败的家族生意.

programme.desc: 双效护理, 天然成分深层滋养护发素，维护头皮头发健康.

programme.title: 生活达人 S13
programme.desc: (重)(双声道-中/韩) 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的.

programme.title: Go Go 台湾 II
programme.desc: (重) GoGo台湾带观众到台湾每一个角落，寻找最好玩的地方，最道地及好吃的食物，最经济实惠的饭店和住宿。在新的一辑将会带大家到新竹，屏东，基隆，宜兰等等.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 燕珠考虑接纳汉洁，但一看到汉洁就想到绍源跟初恋女友的感情，所以自然而然地讨厌汉洁。汉洁虽然不知道燕珠为何不喜欢她，却重复地向燕珠道歉，令燕珠觉得很心疼.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 爱莉想介入太阳和露莉的感情，所以故意搞砸他们的约会，令露莉以为太阳真的变心了，很伤心。太阳拿出项链送给露莉，并向她保证自己没有喜欢上别人.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 恩赫把素拉带到他的住所跟彩琳见面。素拉以为彩琳要对付她，岂料彩琳却说她需要素拉的帮助，两人才能一起活命.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 彩琳在泰山召开高层会议宣布让载尚成为会长前，让泰山知道载尚侵占公款，并筹集秘密资金。若向有关当局呈报，载尚和泰山集团都会毁于一旦。泰山跟彩琳做交易，把太平洋化妆品的股份还给闵家，并同意让彩琳跟载尚离婚.

programme.title: 乘风破浪的姐姐 S1
programme.desc: 节目邀请30位年龄在30岁以上的已出道的女艺人，通过封闭式训练和比赛，最终由全民投票选出7名女艺人组成全新女团.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S1
programme.desc: (重) 全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法.

programme.title: 婉通夫人
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/泰) 阿贵请求国王若能够证明自己没有杀害坤沛和坤岚，将婉通赐予他。国王要阿贵和阿畅进行蹈火仪式证明清白。.

programme.title: 婉通夫人
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/泰) 阿畅国王说出自己冤枉阿贵，并将杀害坤岚和坤沛之事嫁祸于满函余孽。国王惩罚阿畅入狱。阿畅出狱后布局报复.

programme.title: 地球那一边
programme.desc: 外蒙古游牧民族饲养了约4000万头牲畜，其中包括了牛、羊、骆驼、驴和马等等。牧民逢冬会展开好几百公里的迁徙，历经风险寻找栖息地，确保牲畜活命。主持人李心钰将跟着一家牧民穿越戈壁沙漠，寻找过冬的绿洲.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: 世娜照胜赫的指示到洁姿美妆偷拍产品设计图，行径被佳英录下来。世娜与合作人见面，将设计图交给对方的同时被警方逮捕.

programme.title: 罪孽牢笼
programme.desc: Ep 40:阿月数晚都梦见自己的婆婆跟她索命。原来阿月早期受不了婆婆的凌辱，把自己的婆婆害死。Ep 41:众人看到宋迪大师为阿月解蛊。仪式结束后，大家开始唾弃蕾奴。蕾奴无法待在春森县，彻夜离开。Ep 42:阿月终于领悟到自己之前替儿子们找老婆的行为害儿子们陷入痛苦。阿沙得知家里发生一连串的事，立刻回春森县。阿月终于接受詹妲成为阿沙的老婆.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: Ep 3: 报纸上刊登爱罗受访时的照片。珊荷的母亲白琴熙认出爱罗身上项链的样式，和秀浩被抛弃时身上戴的一样，怀疑爱罗就是秀浩的生母.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: Ep 4: 秀浩收到了奥娜集团会长夫人千纯林送的胸针礼物，意外发现自己竟是朴家的孩子.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: 我的欧洲之旅，这一集来到了卢森堡！相信大家听说过，这是一个非常小但是非常有钱的国家喔～被法国、德国、比利时三国包围，总面积只比台北市大一点点。虽然卢森堡三个国字是从英文Luxembourg直翻过来，但这个名字翻得非常的好！因为这个国家虽然小，但有非常美丽的森林和非常多的城堡！很多人都只是顺路经过所以玩一下，但其实他也是一个很有特色的国家哦！就让我带大家，来参观一​​下吧！跟着庆典去旅行.

programme.title: 我的爱丽丝
programme.desc: Ep 13度妍对泰伊消失的事情产生好奇，而泰伊却因为非法穿越时间旅行，身上出现了被虫洞辐射的湿疹。敏赫终于知道自己的儿子是镇谦后，内心对他充满愧疚。 Ep 14敏赫去见李世勋时碰到他遇害，还没来得及查案，镇谦就到了。镇谦误以为敏赫是凶手，两人大打出手。敏赫逃走后，因怀疑诗英是凶手，于是回到未来爱丽丝营地找她。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡
programme.desc: 新传媒艺人姚彣隆曾是月光族？而多栖发展艺人黄靖伦也曾借钱度日？有人说，新加坡人有钱没钱多少都背负着债务，这是真的吗？究竟是什么原因让新加坡人负债？这集的《10大新加坡》就要探讨新加坡人欠债的原因.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: 世娜煽动洁姿美妆代理店的店长们，指佳英不赞成洁姿美妆跟YB化妆品进行企业合并就会导致洁姿美妆走向倒闭。代理店的店长们和公司职员都觉得佳英在影响公司的发展，要佳英离开公司.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: Ep 6: 被当成道京的秀浩昏迷了五年仍然没有醒过来。朴会长决定紧急召开理事会，让金南俊担任代表理事一职.

programme.desc: During a chance encounter on a train, Siva and Sakthi lie to each other about their professions. After the truth comes out, a series of hilarious incidents ensue because of the duo's efforts to exact revenge upon each other.

programme.title: Deepavalikku Enna Samayal
programme.desc: A refreshing cooking series that explores the unique Deepavali dishes of various communities across the Indian diaspora that celebrate the festival of lights. As the chefs whip up the mouth watering dishes, the whacky & bubbly hosts engage the audience with fun banter & activities about how Indians celebrate Deepavali! Celebrate Deepavali with a variety of dishes cooked in a healthier way.

programme.title: Vallamai Thaaraiyo
programme.desc: Vallamai Tharayo revolves around how well-meaning parents inadvertently end up pushing their daughter into an imbalanced marriage, and how she fumbles her way through.

programme.title: Adukku Vettu Annasamy 2: 80's Lootty!
programme.desc: After a laugh-riot fiesta in the 70's era, the iconic Adukku Vettu Annasamy returns for a phenomenal 2nd round of fun, laughter and celebration with the 80's Lootty! Going all retro this time, Cultural Medallion Recipient & Pradhana Vizha 2021's Lifetime Achievement Award Recipient P.Krishnan's lovable characters come back alive with an all new zest and only the best to bring down the house with laughs! Happening 10 years after the first season, Annasamy is retired now but can't sit idle,.

programme.title: Kannai Katti Kollaathe
programme.desc: In Kannai Katti Kollathe, Kokila and and Malene take on the roles of grand-mother and granddaughter. Malene is an ignorant but inquisitive girl who is always questioning the stories surrounding superstitions of her Grandma, a wise old lady who has embraced the modern fashion and contemporary lifestyle but yet gives a lot of importance to Indian practices and culture. She offers the traditional stories surrounding practices.Not able to accept her words, Malene steps out to find out the truth!

programme.title: Achamillai Manamae
programme.desc: Maya arrives in Buranda Prison. She learns the way of the prison, and tries to find out how she can reach Surya from recollecting her conversations with Sivam. She follows the plan closely, and finds the only person who can bring her to the same isolation cell that Surya is being held in. Meanwhile, The Boss is informed of an incoming raid at the Dragon Den.
